title: Equal opportunity tapes
creator_credit: Nicholas Cockram and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Emphasises the importance of equal opportunity to both male and female teachers. Tape 1. Introduces and defines the concept of equal opportunity. 2. Designed to show what the real world is about for women. 3. Attempts to encourage teachers to examine, analyse and consider altering their classroom practice.
